reviewText:
Playboy / Girls of Hawaiian Tropic, Naked In Paradise is one hour and was released on video on May 9, 1995. Thirteen lovely ladies are featured in this video. In the beginning of the video the air time was quite long. It took twenty minutes just to go through three ladies. Toward the end the ladies air time seen to get shorter. There is a lot of white in this video as you are about to find out. You have one Playboy Playmate and one future Playmate. This is the video that started it all for Angel Boris Playboy career; though her hair looks a mess. Here are the ladies in the order that they appear.

Debbie Ann\Paradise-White robe comes off to see white two piece lingerie; Debbie becomes topless and finally naked
Angel Boris (Playboy Playmate of the Month for July 1996)\Moonlit Beach-Wearing a long white dress, dances to the rhythm of the drum and begins strip down. First topless then fully naked
Sung Hi Lee\Passion Fruit-Wearing a white dress on by a stream and becomes topless for awhile and then completely naked
Lana Gibbons\Jungle-Long white dress comes off and is wearing nothing but white panties, then the panties come off and hides hear nudity with a giant leaf and eventually become naked
Amy Hayes\Wild Orchids-Wearing a white see through shirt, white panties comes off, never completely naked except briefly at the end
Michelle Stanford\White Sandy Beach-When the white robe comes off she is most of the time naked. The robe comes on at the end of segment.
Sarah Hutchinson\Secret Island-Sarah is wearing a white bikini on a hammock, top comes off. Bottoms comes off next to a tree and she remains naked
Doreen Wetzel\Waterfalls-Doreen strips off the blue bikini at the waterfalls and stays naked.
Scottie Hood & Kristen Holland\Beach Sirens-Two ladies naked on a beach
Shellani Taarud\Lagoon-Shellani takes off her shirt and skirt in the lagoon and remains naked 98% of the time.
Ashley Allen (Playboy Playmate of the Month for August 1992)\Hawaiian Barth-Yellow skirt comes off the yellow bikini and stays nude. The black barth covers her body sometimes
Shana Hiatt\Volcano-Once Shana takes off the red clothes she remains nude in the rest of the segment.

In the end this was an excellent nude Playboy video. Playboy / Girls of Hawaiian Tropic, Naked In Paradise gets an AAAAA+++++.

I love the views, and of course, the women are very hot. They look just like super models. The picture on this website is not the actual picture of Girls of Hawaiian Tropic. I think they put the wrong picture by mistake. If anyone wants to see the actual picture of this video, feel free to email me.
